0.query:
timeseries argocd_app_info = avg(argocd_app_info), by: { Name= name, Health = health_status, Sync = sync_status , Server = dest_server, Namespace = dest_namespace, Project = project}, shift: -1m, interval: 1m
| filter in(Name, $Application)
| filter in(Namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(Server, $Server)
| filter in(Project, $Project)
| fieldsAdd argocd_app_info = arrayLast(argocd_app_info)  | sort Name asc
0.title: Application Health and Sync state

10.content:
### ArgoCD Sync and Deployment Pulse

This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of the status of ArgoCD Application States and sync notifications related to the deployment of new applications. It is designed to help platform engineers and DevOps teams monitor and manage their applications and deployment processes effectively.

11.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment"
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(deployment.server, $Server)
| filter in(argocd.app.project.name, $Project)
| summarize errorRate = if(count() == 0, 0, else: toDouble(countIf(task.outcome == "failed")) / toDouble(count())*100)
11.title: Error rate

12.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter task.outcome == "succeeded"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(deployment.server, $Server)
| filter in(argocd.app.project.name, $Project)
| summarize count(), by:{argocd.app.health.status}
12.title: Application  Health Status after Succesfull Sync

14.content:
#### Share feedback 
We welcome your feedback on this dashboard to help us improve and deliver a more effective observability solution, ensuring it provides maximum value to your software development lifecycle and delivery processes. Please post a comment here: [Feedback channel for CI/CD Pipeline Observability](https://community.dynatrace.com/t5/Platform-Engineering/Feedback-channel-for-CI-CD-Pipeline-Observability/m-p/269193/highlight/true#M1) (Dynatrace Community).
#
---

#### Additional resources
**Pipeline Observability**
* [Observability throughout the software development lifecycle increases delivery performance](https://www.dynatrace.com/news/blog/observability-throughout-the-software-development-lifecycle/) (blog post)
* [Concepts](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/pipeline-observability-concepts) (docs)

**Software Development Lifecycle Events**
* [Ingest SDLC events](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/pipeline-observability-sdlc-events/sdlc-events) (docs)
* [SDLC event specification]() (docs)
#
---

#### About this dashboard

Release v0.1.0, [Origin](https://github.com/Dynatrace/dynatrace-configuration-as-code-samples)

15.content:
### Application Sync Events 

This section provides a clear and detailed view of ArgoCD sync activities, such as currently running syncs, status of finished syncs, and performance indicators.

---

16.content:
### Deployment overview 

This section provides a comprehensive view of the deployment status across different applications.

---

17.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "argocd" 
| filter isNotNull(argocd.app.reconciliation.time)
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(deployment.server, $Server)
| filter in(argocd.app.project.name, $Project)
| dedup {deployment.name, deployment.namespace, end_time, vcs.ref.base.revision}, sort:{argocd.app.reconciliation.time desc}
| fields AppName= deployment.name, Namespace = deployment.namespace , Status = task.outcome , Health = argocd.app.health.status, SyncToRev = vcs.ref.base.revision, Duration = duration, Started = start_time, Ended = end_time, Message = argocd.sync.operation_state.outcome, Repository = vcs.repository.url.full, RepositoryRef = vcs.ref.base.name,Project = argocd.app.project.name, Server = deployment.server
| sort Ended desc
| limit 20
17.title: Finished deployments | last 20

2.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "argocd" 
| filter isNotNull(argocd.app.reconciliation.time)
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(deployment.server, $Server)
| filter in(argocd.app.project.name, $Project)
| dedup {deployment.name, deployment.namespace}, sort:{argocd.app.reconciliation.time desc}
| fields AppName= deployment.name, Namespace = deployment.namespace , Status = task.outcome ,SyncToRev = vcs.ref.base.revision,TimeFromLastSync = toTimestamp(now()) - ToTimestamp(end_time), Started = start_time, Ended = end_time
| sort AppName asc
2.title: Last Application Sync Operation

20.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(deployment.server, $Server)
| filter in(argocd.app.project.name, $Project)
| summarize deploymentDuration = median(duration), by: appName = deployment.name
| sort deploymentDuration desc
| limit 5
20.title: Median Deployment Duration by Application  (Top 5)

21.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(deployment.server, $Server)
| filter in(argocd.app.project.name, $Project)
| dedup vcs.ref.base.revision, start_time
| makeTimeseries duration=median(duration), by:{deployment.name}
//| fields deploymentDuration = duration, endTime = end_time, deploymnent.name

//| fieldsAdd arrayAvg(`avg(duration)`)
21.title: Median Sync Duration

22.title: Sync Activities

23.content: This section leverages Prometheus metrics exposed by ArgoCD components. If no data is shown, activate [Prometheus monitoring](https://github.com/Dynatrace/dynatrace-configuration-as-code-samples/tree/main/argocd_observability) in Dynatrace for the Kubernetes cluster hosting ArgoCD.

3.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "argocd" 
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(deployment.server, $Server)
| filter in(argocd.app.project.name, $Project)
| dedup vcs.ref.base.revision, start_time
| summarize count()
3.title: Total Finished Sync Operations

4.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "argocd" 
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(deployment.server, $Server)
| filter in(argocd.app.project.name, $Project)
| dedup vcs.ref.base.revision, start_time
| summarize count(), by:{task.outcome}
4.title: Finished Sync Operations by Status

5.query:
timeseries argocd_app_info = avg(argocd_app_info), by: { Name= name, Health = health_status, Server = dest_server, Namespace = dest_namespace, Project = project }, shift: -1m, interval: 1m
| fieldsAdd argocd_app_info = arrayLast(argocd_app_info)  | sort Name asc
| filter in(Name, $Application)
| filter in(Namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(Server, $Server)
| filter in(Project, $Project)
| summarize count(), by:{Health}
5.title: Health

6.query:
timeseries argocd_app_info = avg(argocd_app_info), by: { Name= name, Sync = sync_status, Server = dest_server, Namespace = dest_namespace, Project = project }, shift: -1m, interval: 1m
| fieldsAdd argocd_app_info = arrayLast(argocd_app_info)  | sort Name asc
| filter in(Name, $Application)
| filter in(Namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(Server, $Server)
| filter in(Project, $Project)
| summarize count(), by:{Sync}
6.title: Sync

7.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "argocd" 
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(deployment.server, $Server)
| filter in(argocd.app.project.name, $Project)
| dedup vcs.ref.base.revision, start_time
| summarize median(duration)
7.title: Sync Operation Duration | Median

8.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "argocd" 
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(deployment.server, $Server)
| filter in(argocd.app.project.name, $Project)
| dedup vcs.ref.base.revision, start_time
| summarize percentile(duration,90)
8.title: Sync Operation Duration | p90

9.query:
fetch events | filter event.provider == "argocd" 
| filter event.status == "finished"
| filter in(deployment.name, $Application)
| filter in(deployment.namespace, $Namespace)
| filter in(deployment.server, $Server)
| filter in(argocd.app.project.name, $Project)
| dedup vcs.ref.base.revision, start_time
| summarize Count = count(), by:{ deployment.name}
| sort Count desc
| limit 5
9.title: Sync Operations Frequency by Application (Top 5)

variables.input:
timeseries argocd_app_info = avg(argocd_app_info),by: {name}
| summarize appName = collectDistinct(name)
| expand appName
| sort appName

timeseries argocd_app_info = avg(argocd_app_info),by: { dest_namespace}
| summarize namespace = collectDistinct(dest_namespace)
| expand namespace
| sort namespace

timeseries argocd_app_info = avg(argocd_app_info),by: { dest_server}
| append [fetch events 
| filter event.category == "task" 
| filter event.type == "deployment" 
| filter event.status == "finished" 
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| fields dest_server=deployment.server 
]
| summarize server = collectDistinct(dest_server)
| expand server
| sort server

timeseries argocd_app_info = avg(argocd_app_info),by: { project}
| summarize project = collectDistinct(project)
| expand project
| sort project
